snippet.title: A Magical Tale: Cavern Crawler Android/iOS Trailer + Snow Cavern Downloadable Content
snippet.description:
OUT ON 31/08!
A Magical Tale: Cavern Crawler is a mobile game also being ported to consoles. You have 6 different unique caverns to complete. All filled with puzzles, skeletons and various obstacles...

Once you begin, you will enter your first cavern and notice three things: gold, a key and a door. Your objective is to complete the individual one-screen levels by taking the key to the yellow door.

Each cavern has a unique attribute that you will not find in any other. From water puzzles to digging under the ground, you won't be repeating the same puzzle.

A Magical Tale: Cavern Crawler is available to download on Google Play, Snow Cavern downloadable content coming soon. iOS coming soon.

For more information visit A Magical Tale's website: http://amagicaltale.darklightgames.co.uk/

A Magical Tale: Cavern Crawler is a game created and developed by Dark Light Games: http://darklightgames.co.uk/
